column6: In the wake of the WAR OF KINGS, the 31st Century is hit by wave after wave of temporal distortion! Rocked by this lethal and uncertain era, a handful of surviving Guardians must confront some familiar faces...
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | letterer:Joe Caramagna | inker:Wes Craig | inker:Pasqual Ferry | colorist:Frank D'Armata | colorist:Nathan Fairbairn
